feed.title: Matt's dev musings
feed.subtitle: A blog where I record my travels through code.

entry.title: First Post
entry.content:
A blog?

This is a little blog I've decided to put together to document my travels through coding. I'm going to use it mainly to record a diary of my work, aid-memoire for stuff I've learned that I'll probably forget, and general help for others using my code or areas I'm an "expert" in.

I don't know how often it will be updated, but I have attempted to make it as simple as possible for myself by using Wyam to statically generate the content.

So, what I am currently working on...

  • Mapsui.Forms - I have a custom version, which adds custom layers with customisable map objects, as well as a better abstraction of the map internal hierarchy.
  • xamarin-bluetooth-le - I have an Android only version that implements reliable writes.
  • PSP development - I am trying to learn more about this and see if I can make some small games as a fun side project from the day job.
  • Considering getting in to writing programming courses. Mainly around mobile development with Xamarin Forms.

There's more, but we will let that unfold over time.
entry.summary: This is a little blog I've decided to put together to document my travels through coding. I'm going to use it mainly to record a diary of my work, aid-memoire for stuff I've learned that I'll probably forget, and general help for others using my code or areas I'm an "expert" in.
